subject: Issue of Access control cards to the visitors
text: HTd4 <7414 <THN gifarru TMF /Phone: 91-11-25074100426074200 7FA /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (a Wqec, UyT WRartt #iR (iurf +M) [37. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 3553 National Highwavs Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 1-5Wi 6, 0orr-10, EUFT, # fani-t10 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-i0 Dwarke; New Delhi-110075 No.11041/200/2006-Admn; Nov. 27, 2006 CIRCULAR Sub; Issue of Access Control Cards to the Visitors: With a purpose to regulate the entry of the visitors in the office complex, it has been decided that;: The visitors will be allowed with the permission Of officer of the level of GMs and above for two hours duration only. The visitors to office Of Chairman & Members will be allowed as per the existing practice: In case the visitors are required to stay for longer period, they will be allowed on specific   recommendation of the concerned officer, ii The written requests from PS to GM and above and direct requests from DGM & Managers in writing will also be entertained iv) For conducting the Arbitration proceedings in HQs and any other similar event requiring group of visitors staying longer than two hours, the concerned officer shall send list of visitors to the Reception with due authentication and the restriction 0f two hours duration shall not be applicable for such meetings: 2 This issues with the approval of Chairman, NHAI; Mwl (G.P CHAND} General Manager (Admn) Copy to: 1. AII Officers Staff in NHAI 23 Reception / Security 3. G4S Facil) 1 Security, Camp: NHAI Nlin; lity
